caption.p: Mechanisms underlying neurological sequelae in survivors of WNV and ZIKV encephalitis. (1) Infiltrating antiviral, effector, IFNγ-expressing CD8 T cells promote virolgic clearance from infected neurons. (2) Trm-derived IFNγ, which remains chronically elevated, promotes microglial activation, and subsequent engulfment of presynaptic (WNV) or postsynaptic (ZIKV) termini in the CA3 region of the hippocampus and deficits in spatial learning [ 21 ▪▪]. The figure is based on a figure in the journal 10.1038/nature18283.
